page.title: 11AN OVERSPILL ESTATE, WIDNES
page.content: { 1965 Widnes,}a{Lancashire}town of 54,763 people.A booming industrial town with many of the working population employed by I.C.I in the manufacture of chemicals. { 1985}Twenty years on, Widnes, a {Cheshire}town of{56,500}people with more than one in five of its adult population unemployed. How has Upton fared? A survey listed the{advantages}of living in Upton as _ pleasant area,fresh air,surrounding open countryside,modern houses and gardens,safe play areas for children. The{disadvantages}are _the high cost of transport,too far from the town centre,no clinic,no chemist,smell from factories,too many public houses and too many dogs running loose. {80% were glad they lived in Upton. {ST. BASILS JUNIOR SCHOOL
